meanings.sent1: The govs in our state make important decisions for the people.
meanings.sent2: I saw the govs at the meeting discussing new laws.
meanings.sent3: Why did the govs decide to have a pizza party at the capitol?
meanings.sent4: The govs are like the captains of a ship, guiding us through rough waters.
meanings.sent5: The govs wear fancy suits and have big responsibilities.

meanings.definition: Govs: a slang term for government officials
meanings.sent1: The govs are working hard to improve our city.
meanings.sent2: I met with the govs to discuss funding for the new project.
meanings.sent3: The govs were spotted dancing at the town festival.
meanings.sent4: The govs are the superheroes of our community, always ready to help.
meanings.sent5: The govs have to deal with a lot of paperwork and meetings.

meanings.sent1: Different govs around the world have varying rules and laws.
meanings.sent2: The govs are responsible for maintaining order in society.
meanings.sent3: The govs of the world decided to ban all vegetables.
meanings.sent4: The govs of history have shaped the world we live in today.
meanings.sent5: The govs have the power to change the course of history.
